text.value:
insert into fss.pipelinerunstatus
(pl_name, pl_runid, pl_triggertime, pl_triggertype, End_time, Start_time,status,error_message)
values (
  '@{pipeline().Pipeline}',
  '@{pipeline().RunId}',
  '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}',
  '@{pipeline().TriggerType}',
  '@{variables('End_time')}',
  '@{variables('Start_time')}',
  '@{activity('Copy data').status}',
  '@{if(equals(activity('Copy data').status, 'Failed'), activity('Copy data').error_message, null)}'
)

scripts.text:
INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  t.share_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
WHERE t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date)
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;

WITH date_range AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series('2020-01-01'::date, '2025-10-31'::date, interval '1 day')
),
groups AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT share_id
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat
),
all_combinations AS (
  SELECT g.share_id, d.dt AS date
  FROM groups g CROSS JOIN date_range d
)
insert into fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal(
share_id, 
date) 
SELECT ac.share_id, ac.date
FROM all_combinations ac
LEFT JOIN ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  ON agfs.share_id = ac.share_id
  AND agfs.date = ac.date
  AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
WHERE agfs.financial_stat_id IS NULL;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  value,
  date,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  share_id,
  created_date,
  created_by
)
SELECT
  prev.value,
  tm.date,
  4,
  tm.share_id,
  NOW() AS created_date,
  'system' AS created_by
FROM fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal tm
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value
  FROM  ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  WHERE agfs.share_id = tm.share_id
    AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    AND agfs.date < tm.date
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
) prev ON true
and prev.value IS NOT null

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  t.share_id,
  t.transaction_type_code_id AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  t.transaction_date::date AS date,
  SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS value
FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
where share_id = '2110070001' and t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_type_code_id;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value
)
SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date)
    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  where share_id = 2110070001
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;

WITH date_range AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series('2025-09-20'::date, '2025-11-26'::date, interval '1 day')
),
groups AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT share_id
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat
  where share_id = 2110070001
),
all_combinations AS (
  SELECT g.share_id, d.dt AS date
  FROM groups g CROSS JOIN date_range d
)
insert into fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal(
share_id, 
date) 
SELECT ac.share_id, ac.date
FROM all_combinations ac
LEFT JOIN ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  ON agfs.share_id = ac.share_id
  AND agfs.date = ac.date
  AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
WHERE agfs.financial_stat_id IS NULL;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  value,
  date,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  share_id,
  created_date,
  created_by
)
SELECT
  prev.value,
  tm.date,
  4,
  tm.share_id,
  NOW() AS created_date,
  'system' AS created_by
FROM fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal tm
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value
  FROM  ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  WHERE agfs.share_id = 2110070001
    AND agfs.share_id = tm.share_id
    AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    AND agfs.date < tm.date
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
) prev ON true
and prev.value IS NOT null

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value

WHERE t.transaction_type_code_id IN (1, 2, 3)

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  share_id,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  date,
  value

SELECT
  sub.share_id,
  4 AS financial_stat_type_code_id,
  sub.transaction_date::date AS date,
  sub.balance AS value
FROM (

    t.share_id,
    t.transaction_date,
    t.balance,
    t.transaction_id
  FROM ch_fss."transaction" t
  ORDER BY t.share_id, t.transaction_date::date, t.transaction_id DESC
) sub;

WITH date_range AS (
  SELECT generate_series::date AS dt
  FROM generate_series('2020-01-01'::date, '2025-10-31'::date, interval '1 day')
),
groups AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT share_id
  FROM ch_fss.share_financial_stat

  SELECT g.share_id, d.dt AS date
  FROM groups g CROSS JOIN date_range d

insert into fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal(
share_id, 
date) 
SELECT ac.share_id, ac.date
FROM all_combinations ac
LEFT JOIN ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  ON agfs.share_id = ac.share_id
  AND agfs.date = ac.date
  AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
WHERE agfs.financial_stat_id IS NULL;

INSERT INTO ch_fss.share_financial_stat (
  value,
  date,
  financial_stat_type_code_id,
  share_id,
  created_date,
  created_by
)
SELECT
  prev.value,
  tm.date,
  4,
  tm.share_id,
  NOW() AS created_date,
  'system' AS created_by
FROM fss_stg.stg_missing_share_ending_bal tm
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value
  FROM  ch_fss.share_financial_stat agfs
  WHERE agfs.share_id = tm.share_id
    AND agfs.financial_stat_type_code_id = 4
    AND agfs.date < tm.date
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
) prev ON true
and prev.value IS NOT null

delete from ch_fss.share_financial_stat where 
date >= @START_DATE
and date  < @END_DATE

scriptLines: locate(' - ', Comments) - (locate('Added by: ', Comments) + length('Added by: '))
locate('***', Comments, locate('***', Comments) + 1) - (locate('On: ', Comments) + length('On: '))
story_date = toString(toTimestamp(story_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss a'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')) ~> derivedColumn3

insert into fss.pipelinerunstatus
(pl_name, pl_runid, pl_triggertime, pl_triggertype, End_time, Start_time,status,error_message)
values (
  '@{pipeline().Pipeline}',
  '@{pipeline().RunId}',
  '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}',
  '@{pipeline().TriggerType}',
  '@{variables('End_time')}',
  '@{variables('Start_time')}',
  '@{variables('status')}',
  '@{variables('error_message')}'
)
